mapper.select: select rownum as ss, se.* from (select rownum as rw, n.* from (select p.* from (select * from point where users_seq = #{usersSeq}) p order by p.point_regdate desc) n) se where se.rw between (#{pageStart}+1) and (#{pageStart}+5)
mapper.insert: insert into point values(point_seq.nextval,#{pointChange}, (select point_current + #{pointChange} from point where point_regdate =(select max(point_regdate) from point where users_seq =#{usersSeq})),'charge',to_char(sysdate, 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),#{usersSeq},null)

insert into point values(point_seq.nextval,#{pointChange},(select point_current - #{pointChange} from point where point_regdate =(select max(point_regdate) from point where users_seq=#{usersSeq})),'refund',to_char(sysdate, 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),#{usersSeq},null)
mapper.select: select point_current from point where point_regdate = (select max(point_regdate) from point where users_seq = #{value})
select count(rownum) from (select * from point where users_seq = #{value})
